archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0745
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As customer, when I am required to give more information for an in-flight order, I want the abilty to be notified and fill in any forms or information digitally, so that its quick and easy for me and the order continues quickly.

properties.value: as above but from customer side? To be discussed on separate workshop.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
